summary: maloop.ai company that provides tablet menus for the hospitality and retail industries. In July 2019, they released version 1 of their product, which offers various features and capabilities. They also introduced an automated guest reservation system to help with scheduling guests on busy days. Additionally, they highlighted the importance of point of sale integration, which allows guests to checkout on their own.
